computationStarted.title2: Please wait. Computation is still in progress.
computationStarted.subtitle: This usually takes a couple of minutes.

computationPending.title2: Please wait. Computation is still pending.
computationPending.subtitle: This will take a couple of minutes. Task will be started once other computations in the system are completed.

computationResult.title: Computation complete!
computationResult.subtitle: You can start the download by clicking the button below.

computationFailure.title: Computation Failure
computationFailure.subtitle: Please try again the computation and contact us if the problem persists.

computationRetry.title: Pending Computation
computationRetry.subtitle: Computation will be retried. Please check later for the results.
